History of Present Illness (HPI): The patient has been focusing on positive aspects of life, engaging in activities like painting and spending time at the beach, which have contributed to an uplifted mood. They have also been working on improving relationships, particularly with their brother, by being more understanding and communicative
Psychosocial History: The patient is considering future plans with their wife, including potential travel and relocation to a more nature-oriented environment. They express a desire for better understanding and communication with family members
Therapeutic Interventions: The plan includes setting small creative goals, exploring mindfulness practices, and trying guided meditation techniques in future sessions
Next Steps: The patient is encouraged to dedicate time for creative activities and to continue working on communication strategies with family
